;piece 45
;

;added 092105 ~ Tropod
;street bend, diagonal avenue ~ needs own IIDs due to path variations
;TYPE1=0x00000202,0x01000003,0x04004500,1,0
;TYPE1=0x02000202,0x01000003,0x04004500,1,0

;street corner, diagonal avenue
;TYPE1=0x00000202,0x00030000,0x12345678,0,0
;TYPE1=0x00000202,0x01000000,0x12345678,0,0
;TYPE1=0x00000202,0x01030000,0x12345678,0,0

;street orthogonal, avenue bend/T
;TYPE1=0x00000200,0x04020004,0x00000100,0,0
;
;
;Update 101006 ~ memo
;--diagonal streets--
;
;single diagonal street, orthogonal avenue
TYPE0=0x00010000,0x02000204,0x5F502F00,0,0
TYPE1=0x01000000,0x00020402,0x5F502F00,1,0
TYPE2=0x00000001,0x02040200,0x5F502F00,2,0
TYPE3=0x00000100,0x04020002,0x5F502F00,3,0
TYPE4=0x00000003,0x02040200,0x5F502F00,0,1
TYPE5=0x00000300,0x04020002,0x5F502F00,3,1
TYPE6=0x00030000,0x02000204,0x5F502F00,2,1
TYPE7=0x03000000,0x00020402,0x5F502F00,1,1

;FLEXFLUPs Overcrossing-Street
TYPE1=0x02040204,0x04030403,0x06701000,0,0
TYPE2=0x04020402,0x03040304,0x06701000,1,0

;--Ave x Street With Median--
TYPE0=0x02040200,0x04020002,0x04004400,3,0
TYPE1=0x00020402,0x02040200,0x04004400,2,0
TYPE2=0x02000204,0x00020402,0x04004400,1,0
TYPE3=0x04020002,0x02000204,0x04004400,0,0

TYPE4=0x02040204,0x00020402,0x04004400,1,0 
TYPE5=0x04020402,0x02000204,0x04004400,0,0
TYPE6=0x02040204,0x04020002,0x04004400,3,0
TYPE7=0x04020402,0x02040200,0x04004400,2,0

;--Midblock Crosswalks for Avenue--
;By:			Lucario Boricua
;Date created:	2022-july-16
;BIRTH OF THE PEDESTRIAN REVOLUTION MOD
;Last update:	2022-august-05
;Avenue Crosswalk Size 1 (0x5C501780) - ortho AVE and street false intersection (FLEX)
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x01040104,0x02040200,0x5C501780,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x04010401,0x04020002,0x5C501780,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x01040104,0x02000204,0x5C501780,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x04010401,0x00020402,0x5C501780,3,0
;
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x03040304,0x02040200,0x5C501780,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x04030403,0x00020402,0x5C501780,1,1
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x03040304,0x02000204,0x5C501780,2,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x04030403,0x04020002,0x5C501780,3,1

;Avenue Crosswalk Size 2 inbound (0x5C501800) - ortho AVE and street false intersection (FLEX)
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x01020402,0x02040200,0x5C501800,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x02040201,0x04020002,0x5C501800,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x04020102,0x02000204,0x5C501800,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x02010204,0x00020402,0x5C501800,3,0
;
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x03020402,0x02040200,0x5C501800,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x02030204,0x00020402,0x5C501800,1,1
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x04020302,0x02000204,0x5C501800,2,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x02040203,0x04020002,0x5C501800,3,1

;Avenue Crosswalk Size 2 outbound (0x5C501880) - ortho AVE and street false intersection (FLEX)
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x04020102,0x02040200,0x5C501880,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x02010204,0x04020002,0x5C501880,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x01020402,0x02000204,0x5C501880,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x02040201,0x00020402,0x5C501880,3,0
;
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x04020302,0x02040200,0x5C501880,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x02040203,0x00020402,0x5C501880,1,1
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x03020402,0x02000204,0x5C501880,2,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x02030204,0x04020002,0x5C501880,3,1

;Avenue Crosswalk Size 3 crosswalk approach (0x5C501900) - ortho AVE and street false intersection (FLEX)
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x01040404,0x02040200,0x5C501900,0,0 ;AVE crosswalk approach
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x04040401,0x04020002,0x5C501900,1,0 ;AVE crosswalk approach
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x04040104,0x02000204,0x5C501900,2,0 ;AVE crosswalk approach
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x04010404,0x00020402,0x5C501900,3,0 ;AVE crosswalk approach
;
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x03040404,0x02040200,0x5C501900,0,1 ;AVE crosswalk approach
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x04030404,0x00020402,0x5C501900,1,1 ;AVE crosswalk approach
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x04040304,0x02000204,0x5C501900,2,1 ;AVE crosswalk approach
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x04040403,0x04020002,0x5C501900,3,1 ;AVE crosswalk approach

;###RHD###TYPE1=0x04040104,0x02040200,0x04006100,0,0 ;AVE texture after approach
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x04010404,0x04020002,0x04006100,1,0 ;AVE texture after approach
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x01040404,0x02000204,0x04006100,2,0 ;AVE texture after approach
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x04040401,0x00020402,0x04006100,3,0 ;AVE texture after approach
;
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x04040304,0x02040200,0x04006100,0,1 ;AVE texture after approach
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x04040403,0x00020402,0x04006100,1,1 ;AVE texture after approach
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x03040404,0x02000204,0x04006100,2,1 ;AVE texture after approach
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x04030404,0x04020002,0x04006100,3,1 ;AVE texture after approach

;Avenue Crosswalk Size 3 crosswalk center (0x5C501980) - ortho AVE and street false intersection (FLEX)
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x01020102,0x02040200,0x5C501980,0,0 ;AVE crosswalk center
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x02010201,0x04020002,0x5C501980,1,0 ;AVE crosswalk center
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x01020102,0x02000204,0x5C501980,2,0 ;AVE crosswalk center
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x02010201,0x00020402,0x5C501980,3,0 ;AVE crosswalk center
;
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x03020302,0x02040200,0x5C501980,0,1 ;AVE crosswalk center
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x02030203,0x00020402,0x5C501980,1,1 ;AVE crosswalk center
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x03020302,0x02000204,0x5C501980,2,1 ;AVE crosswalk center
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x02030203,0x04020002,0x5C501980,3,1 ;AVE crosswalk center

;Multi-tile NWM Crosswalk Size 1 (0x5C500000) - ortho AVE (no median) and street false intersection (FLEX)
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x01040104,0x02040204,0x5C500000,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x04010401,0x04020402,0x5C500000,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x01040104,0x02040204,0x5C500000,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x04010401,0x04020402,0x5C500000,3,0
;
;###LHD###TYPE1=0x03040304,0x02040204,0x5C500000,0,1
;###LHD###TYPE2=0x04030403,0x04020402,0x5C500000,1,1
;###LHD###TYPE3=0x03040304,0x02040204,0x5C500000,2,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x04030403,0x04020402,0x5C500000,3,1

;Multi-tile NWM Crosswalk Size 2 half (0x5C500080) - ortho AVE (no median) and street false intersection (FLEX)
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x01020402,0x02040204,0x5C500080,0,0
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x02040201,0x04020402,0x5C500080,1,0
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x04020102,0x02040204,0x5C500080,2,0
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x02010204,0x04020402,0x5C500080,3,0

;###LHD###TYPE3=0x04020302,0x02040204,0x5C500080,2,1
;###LHD###TYPE4=0x02040203,0x04020402,0x5C500080,3,1

;Multi-tile NWM Crosswalk Size 3 crosswalk center (0x5C500100) - ortho AVE (no median) and street false intersection (FLEX)
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x01020102,0x02040204,0x5C500100,0,0 ;AVE crosswalk center
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x02010201,0x04020402,0x5C500100,1,0 ;AVE crosswalk center
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x01020102,0x02040204,0x5C500100,2,0 ;AVE crosswalk center
;###RHD###TYPE4=0x02010201,0x04020402,0x5C500100,3,0 ;AVE crosswalk center

;###LHD###TYPE1=0x03020302,0x02040204,0x5C500100,0,1 ;AVE crosswalk center

;###LHD###TYPE4=0x02030203,0x04020402,0x5C500100,3,1 ;AVE crosswalk center

;Multi-tile NWM Crosswalk Size 3 crosswalk approach (0x5C500180) - ortho AVE (no median) and street false intersection (FLEX)
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x01040404,0x02040204,0x5C500180,0,0 ;Road crosswalk approach
;###RHD###TYPE2=0x04040401,0x04020402,0x5C500180,1,0 ;Road crosswalk approach
;###RHD###TYPE3=0x04040104,0x02040204,0x5C500180,2,0 ;Road crosswalk approach
